steps.StepDefinitions.the_user_clicks_on_cart_icon() Given the cart contain two items # steps.StepDefinitions.the_cart_contain_two_items() Then the cart is empty and icon is zero # steps.StepDefinitions.the_cart_is_empty_and_icon_is_zero() Given the user selects the item # steps.StepDefinitions.the_user_select_the_item() Given the user navigates to amazon website # steps.StepDefinitions.the_user_navigates_to_amazon_website() When the user search for invalid item name # steps.StepDefinitions.user_open_amazon_website() Then the products are displayed as "\"toys\"" # steps.StepDefinitions.theProductsAreDisplayedAs(java.lang.String) No results for Then "No Results" is displayed # steps.StepDefinitions.is_displayed(java.lang.String) When user search for product as "mobiles" # steps.StepDefinitions.user_search_for_products(java.lang.String) Then the products are displayed as "\"mobiles\"" # steps.StepDefinitions.theProductsAreDisplayedAs(java.lang.String)
